# seekableTimeRanges

**Instance Property**

An array of time ranges within which it is possible to seek.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated var seekableTimeRanges: [NSValue] { get }
```

## Discussion

The array contains [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSValue] objects containing a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTimeRange] value indicating the times ranges to which the player item can seek. The time ranges returned may be discontinuous.

## Determining available time ranges

- **loadedTimeRanges**: An array of time ranges indicating media data that is readily available.
